thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 6 of 749
thread.title: Alan
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by Alan

author: Alan
title: Alan
text: We came to Redspot after being let down by the company we'd booked with, which didn't have our car available when we arrived. We moved along and asked at Redspot and they immediately organised a car for us with no fuss. Beautiful almost new car at a price lower than the one we'd been Quote: d by the other company for a lesser vehicle. Thank you Redspot. We'll use you again.
